name: Skitter Snacks
description:
Skitter Snacks is a game about a hungry jumping spider.

However ants are hungry too and don't want to share the leftover doritos.

You must collect all 7 doritos on the map by stealthily climbing, jumping, and skittering around. If stay too close to an ant it will detect you and release pheromones, making ants around go to the location you were detected.

Tonyperiod:
3D Modeling, Shader, Lighting composition, game design

bunnyUFO:
Scripting procedural animation, climbing, and spider gameplay mechanics
